channel.title: Sqlite on Warm journeys of bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Sqlite on Warm journeys of bits and bytes

item.title: API with Golang and Sqlite
item.description: Api with go and sqlite compiles to machine code garbage collected goroutines / green threads channels for thread coordination statically typed no classes or type inheritance interfaces simple language, simple tools mkdir fiberapi cd fiberapi go go version go mod init "github.com/OzanOcak/fiberapi" go get -u gorm.io/driver/mysql go get -u gorm.io/gorm go get github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 Fiber is a Go web framework built on top of Fasthttp, the fastest HTTP engine for Go.
